column7: Review

It's very secure, fast and reliable, there is several issues and I hope developers fixing in next updates 1. Online status not working at the same moment, there is 3 minutes delay, for example I'll close Skype now, still showing me online until next 3 minutes 2. Sometimes show Skype status a long ti...Full ReviewIt's very secure, fast and reliable, there is several issues and I hope developers fixing in next updates 1. Online status not working at the same moment, there is 3 minutes delay, for example I'll close Skype now, still showing me online until next 3 minutes 2. Sometimes show Skype status a long time ago, this situation happened between me and my wife, we were in chat after 30 minutes inactivity instead showing 30 min ago, show a long time ago And more, I'll send to developers email

Great way to communicate, I Skype from Australia to the USA daily and now in the USA. There has appeared some advertisement on the address page which is annoying and I cannot get rid of. It also disturbs me that the adverts relate to my interests and I thought that phone calls were private. There is...Full ReviewGreat way to communicate, I Skype from Australia to the USA daily and now in the USA. There has appeared some advertisement on the address page which is annoying and I cannot get rid of. It also disturbs me that the adverts relate to my interests and I thought that phone calls were private. There is often a problem with the video fragmenting but that appears to be related to the cable system in the USA which gives a much slower service than in Australia. Can't be helped.

It was a good app and service before microsoft bought it! Now my account is blocked by microsoft(!)! No customer support! In support chat, they write they've got technical problems and for further help I need to sign in(which I can't!)! They created a new account for me which I don't need since I've...Full ReviewIt was a good app and service before microsoft bought it! Now my account is blocked by microsoft(!)! No customer support! In support chat, they write they've got technical problems and for further help I need to sign in(which I can't!)! They created a new account for me which I don't need since I've already got an account! I don't need new! I need full access to my old one with my contacts and history and (yes!) money I paid (apperantly, the account is not blocked for paying money to!).

I use this app alot, but after the update, my audio will go out after having the app in the background for less than 10 minutes while on a call. Messages also won't go through unless the app is open in the background. Subtitles also sometimes cuts my audio off if captions are on.

It's the best app it's really very useful I ever rate any aap but it was the best that's why I thought of rating Skype. Yes as it asked me to help improve it however Skype does not need improvement however if I see than I think only 3 thing is their to improve - (i) allow to quote videos and photos ...Full ReviewIt's the best app it's really very useful I ever rate any aap but it was the best that's why I thought of rating Skype. Yes as it asked me to help improve it however Skype does not need improvement however if I see than I think only 3 thing is their to improve - (i) allow to quote videos and photos (ii) allow reacting with more emotions ( till now allowing only 30) (iii) allow to see more than 5 people face in phone

Absolutely ZERO technical/customer support for this app. I have been having freezing issues forever now on my xbox one, and the only thing in technical support matters I can find is at the end of each failed video call, there is a technical issue "survey". Why is there no technical support number to...Full ReviewAbsolutely ZERO technical/customer support for this app. I have been having freezing issues forever now on my xbox one, and the only thing in technical support matters I can find is at the end of each failed video call, there is a technical issue "survey". Why is there no technical support number to call? This is pathetic.

This app is like a lottery some days. It is up to the mood of the app. Some days are great, while other days are a catastrophe. Needs to be more reliable. If there are once any distortions, the network will not become stable again. Meeting needs to be ended and restarted.

Terrible recovery and new device detection. I tried to log into my Skype to check if it would work for my appointment. Long story short I am now locked out as Microsoft verifies my identity over the next 24 hours. Couldn't even email the address I was using to recover my account. Will not recommend....Full ReviewTerrible recovery and new device detection. I tried to log into my Skype to check if it would work for my appointment. Long story short I am now locked out as Microsoft verifies my identity over the next 24 hours. Couldn't even email the address I was using to recover my account. Will not recommend. Really dropped the ball on COVID MS... had a real opportunity here. Now G meetings and Zoom have all of your markets have from me.

App's screen gets stuck after taking a picture and can't seem to take & send a picture. Low end device optimisation required. Splash screen is shown for a long time please reduce it and maybe make it comply with dark mode when dark theme is selected. Lacking in ease of use unlike Skype lite also how...Full ReviewApp's screen gets stuck after taking a picture and can't seem to take & send a picture. Low end device optimisation required. Splash screen is shown for a long time please reduce it and maybe make it comply with dark mode when dark theme is selected. Lacking in ease of use unlike Skype lite also how to do full screen. Laggy control popup and needs low end device optimisations and pretty unresponsive. App struggles a lot on low clock speed cpus please optimise it

Update as of.Sept. 22, 2020: a skype update for android now fixed my constant crash in a certain chat. - old: crashes in a single chat as of a message the other party sent me. always crashes in that faulty buggy thread/content. :((((

Since Microsoft got hold of Skype it's just got more unreliable and M'soft do nothing to improve it. M'soft's attitude is - do nothing and "sod the users". This is proven when no response from Microsoft SKYPE app team is ever given to a reviewer explaining the many problems experienced. So many revi...Full ReviewSince Microsoft got hold of Skype it's just got more unreliable and M'soft do nothing to improve it. M'soft's attitude is - do nothing and "sod the users". This is proven when no response from Microsoft SKYPE app team is ever given to a reviewer explaining the many problems experienced. So many reviewers have pointed out Skype 'Upgrade's' are a lottery to see what else they have fuxxed up. I recommend everyone move to WhatsApp and WeChat both of which are LIGHT YEARS AHEAD of Skype.

It was working good till yesterday but I have some difficulties opening it today. I had 2 accounts for my classes but it shows something like: you have been loged out for your security. I just now made 2 new accounts and j have to again be added in all groups and it is like a mess now.

This is one of the most useful app for me in 21st century. Honestly, Skype has very standard features, it is helping me a lot in the pandemic of Covid-19 Skype has clear audio, great translation, great subtitle tool and good camera I recommend everyone to use this app

First thing first It was once best video calling app before MS acquired but it is trash video quality is worst even in good network or wifi ...before it used to be best even in average network but now video calls are blurry and unrecognizable...u guys have ruined it totally...pathetic work from ms t...Full ReviewFirst thing first It was once best video calling app before MS acquired but it is trash video quality is worst even in good network or wifi ...before it used to be best even in average network but now video calls are blurry and unrecognizable...u guys have ruined it totally...pathetic work from ms teams.....bring that skype which was before 3 4 yrs back
It's a nice app but there's problems with this app, I started recording and came to another tab the recording stopped and was in the group chat please fix it, and please make the messages pop up.

Very useful. I have been using Skype for years , I still do. Skype calling subscriptions have also helped me when I need to call home from overseas, for example family and business numbers such as landline etc.

I can't quote on an only image message. Sometimes i need to reply to those kind of messages. Overall the all is awfully buggy I cannot download a video thats been posted in the group! It says Video saved but nothing is downloaded at all

Skype has quit ringing on my tablet (and my mother's too) when it's closed/sleeping. Now, I'll see a notification that I missed a call when I open my tablet and the app will be open, but it's impossible to pick up a call unless I happen to be using the tablet at the time. I have asked people to let ...Full ReviewSkype has quit ringing on my tablet (and my mother's too) when it's closed/sleeping. Now, I'll see a notification that I missed a call when I open my tablet and the app will be open, but it's impossible to pick up a call unless I happen to be using the tablet at the time. I have asked people to let me know they're calling via messenger bc it rings. I did not change any settings to have caused this, and have since clicked every notification permission I can find, but it still won't ring.
When I put the ongoing call on the background and I use other app, it slows down my phone's performance. also heats up my phone for some reason.

Been using Skype for years. Use both the free call service I also keep a revolving balance on my account so I can access dial up numbers. Its cheaper than using a normal land line and also works wherever there is an Internet connection, so even if the person your callibg doesn't have Skype you can d...Full ReviewBeen using Skype for years. Use both the free call service I also keep a revolving balance on my account so I can access dial up numbers. Its cheaper than using a normal land line and also works wherever there is an Internet connection, so even if the person your callibg doesn't have Skype you can dial them in a conventional manner and make a call. Very useful when travelling, being able to keep in touch with everybody.

Very cool app, it is very useful for students in the time of lock down it's facilities are great, not only host the participants are also allowed To do things like muting anyone it's share screen facility is amazing and is use full for families conference also
It constantly cuts out. Sound quality is sometimes like talking underwater. There is another much better now on the market I think that SKYPE is fooling around with the product too much.
No Matter how many times I Force Stop and change settings to stop it from running in the background, it comes back running when I turn my computer/Tablet/Chromebook back on after a day or so.
There is always the red exclamation mark for sent messages , please fix this issue , It can't even do the basic things like messaging

Skype has been my go to video conference platform for nearly a decade. Some of that time was kind of underwhelming as Microsoft was taking it through multiple botched iterations. I think it is better than ever, even with some limitations. I don't use the mobile version that often but on some calls l...Full ReviewSkype has been my go to video conference platform for nearly a decade. Some of that time was kind of underwhelming as Microsoft was taking it through multiple botched iterations. I think it is better than ever, even with some limitations. I don't use the mobile version that often but on some calls last week I was impressed with its responsiveness, intuitive controls and modern look. Microsoft needs to make it better: better integration with GroupMe, Onedrive integration etc.

Skype used to be a good app. I used it for years and hardly had any problems. Lately it seems to be riddled with problems. Doesn't ring for incoming calls, and I have resorted to ask my contacts to send me a message which then prompts a notification. I can then call them back. The latest issue is in...Full ReviewSkype used to be a good app. I used it for years and hardly had any problems. Lately it seems to be riddled with problems. Doesn't ring for incoming calls, and I have resorted to ask my contacts to send me a message which then prompts a notification. I can then call them back. The latest issue is inability to delete/remove contents of chats. All these glitches are very frustrating. I used to think that this was one of the best app to keep in touch with family. Very disheartening.

Skype is really good. Both FaceTime and voice calls work amazingly on this app. I switched from Discord to this app and there is already positive differences. Like being able to send large files, clean voice calls and FaceTime calls. One thing I haven't been fond of is the entire instant messaging e...Full ReviewSkype is really good. Both FaceTime and voice calls work amazingly on this app. I switched from Discord to this app and there is already positive differences. Like being able to send large files, clean voice calls and FaceTime calls. One thing I haven't been fond of is the entire instant messaging everyone always talks about. When you have good Wi-Fi it works perfectly fine. But when I use LTE (we did a test) At 3 bars of LTE it takes 2 seconds to send the message. At 2 bars or 1,it doesn't send

Love skype as being in another country of my family, the face video & chats help a lot! However, since 2 days ago, a group conversation I created doesn't seem to work...Can't open it more than 2 sec on my phone. All other chats or group work fine, except the one I created! Worked fine for a year & o...Full ReviewLove skype as being in another country of my family, the face video & chats help a lot! However, since 2 days ago, a group conversation I created doesn't seem to work...Can't open it more than 2 sec on my phone. All other chats or group work fine, except the one I created! Worked fine for a year & out of nowhere, bang! No updates wanted, storage is fine...Can you help me? Thank you! Update: back working after 2 weeks, worked for a month, & just now, can't open it again! & no contact from you...

F.ing horrible. Those idiotic animations, smileys (which noone uses) on the call window makes it impossible to hang up and every new update is like a game on what's gonna crash next. This time it logged me out and just shows me a blank grey screen when I try to log back in. Update: now there's also ...Full ReviewF.ing horrible. Those idiotic animations, smileys (which noone uses) on the call window makes it impossible to hang up and every new update is like a game on what's gonna crash next. This time it logged me out and just shows me a blank grey screen when I try to log back in. Update: now there's also no internet connection all the time.
Only Microsoft makes apps unusable. First when adding a photo the app shutdown. Now with the latest update when adding a photo the app stops responding. Well done Microsoft.
Since the last update it does not show notifications when i receive calls or messages very frustrating this app was ok before your update , my issue is not resolved

Skype has quite a few really good features like screen sharing and can deal with video conferencing but one thing that is quite annoying is that I don't receive messages instantly and just later get notifications that I have missed a conversation. The quality of the Windows app has actually reduced ...Full ReviewSkype has quite a few really good features like screen sharing and can deal with video conferencing but one thing that is quite annoying is that I don't receive messages instantly and just later get notifications that I have missed a conversation. The quality of the Windows app has actually reduced which I believe has been intentionally done to push people to use Teams.

The connection and phone call quality is sometimes great, other times extremely poor and cuts in and out. Hard to have a good phonecall with every phonecall. Also doesn't always come through on my end, and will show as a missed call even though I'm pressing the answer button!! If notifications have ...Full ReviewThe connection and phone call quality is sometimes great, other times extremely poor and cuts in and out. Hard to have a good phonecall with every phonecall. Also doesn't always come through on my end, and will show as a missed call even though I'm pressing the answer button!! If notifications have more information it would help

App has some great information & features, but they show remove the Sleep Analysis piece of the app as this is not useful at all. It does not analyse anything & simply records the duration from hitting the start button to dismissing the alarm. It does not analyse the sleep cycle, quality of sleep or...Full ReviewApp has some great information & features, but they show remove the Sleep Analysis piece of the app as this is not useful at all. It does not analyse anything & simply records the duration from hitting the start button to dismissing the alarm. It does not analyse the sleep cycle, quality of sleep or even detection of the user being asleep or awake. It's just fluffy nonsense. I love the mattress, pillow and duvet that this company manufacture. They just need to stick with what they know.
For skype on Android the quality goes more worse. Call disappear before starting. On windows same account is working well.
Eating too much battery. Please fix. Make the interface smooth. It's lagging. Need lightweight UI.

It's free, so can't really complain. When it works, it works well. It works well around two thirds of the time. For the other third, there are times when you can't hear properly, when the video is poor quality etc. The other problem which I haven't resolved is that Skype doesn't ring on my phone and...Full ReviewIt's free, so can't really complain. When it works, it works well. It works well around two thirds of the time. For the other third, there are times when you can't hear properly, when the video is poor quality etc. The other problem which I haven't resolved is that Skype doesn't ring on my phone and sometimes on the computer. I've jumped through every hoop, forum, searched and tried suggestions, looked at notifications etc etc etc. It seems that each time one of the regular updates happens, problems with ringing happens. Overall, I'm happy using it but I wish it were more reliable.

If anything, Skype suffers a bit from its past, less-than-stellar reputation. I used Skype before it was bought by Microsoft and it was quite special and ahead of its time. Then Microsoft bought it right around the Windows 8 era if that tells you anything. They really messed it up. It became unintui...Full ReviewIf anything, Skype suffers a bit from its past, less-than-stellar reputation. I used Skype before it was bought by Microsoft and it was quite special and ahead of its time. Then Microsoft bought it right around the Windows 8 era if that tells you anything. They really messed it up. It became unintuitive, unreliable, and just plain awful on both mobile and desktop. I'm glad to see Skype back in top form moving in a positive direction. It's not quite FaceTime, but it's close and has potential.

I use this app to make out of the country calls every night. Recently, the sound quality has dropped immensely. I always call the same person - the same phone. But for like the last month I have been hearing my voice with an echo and my friend gets my voice sounding much bassier.

I have been using Skype for years, and the quality of my most recent call was better than in the past. So much better, in fact, that I'm going to try migrating some of my Zoom meetings back to Skype. There was no lag between video and voice, and the screen never froze. But Skype has no screen sharin...Full ReviewI have been using Skype for years, and the quality of my most recent call was better than in the past. So much better, in fact, that I'm going to try migrating some of my Zoom meetings back to Skype. There was no lag between video and voice, and the screen never froze. But Skype has no screen sharing, right? I need screen sharing for much of what I do remotely.

Skype is the WORST communication app I've ever used. On Android, it simply won't receive an update to share the screen with other apps. On Linux, one can RECEIVE a message from their contacts, but the messages SENT by this person won't be read by anyone, and I've seen myself in this situation for mu...Full ReviewSkype is the WORST communication app I've ever used. On Android, it simply won't receive an update to share the screen with other apps. On Linux, one can RECEIVE a message from their contacts, but the messages SENT by this person won't be read by anyone, and I've seen myself in this situation for multiple times, no matter how may updates it gets on Linux. It's like they did that on purpose and each update had the goal to make Skype for Linux even worse. If that was the case, congrats Microsoft, Skype literally SUCKS on Android and Linux.

I use Skype to make international calls every day for my job. The quality in general is not so good. After the phone calls, Skype asks to rate the call and the problems. The problems are still the same and I don't see they improve anything. If there's any better choice to make international phone ca...Full ReviewI use Skype to make international calls every day for my job. The quality in general is not so good. After the phone calls, Skype asks to rate the call and the problems. The problems are still the same and I don't see they improve anything. If there's any better choice to make international phone calls, I will change.

Call quality is good, depending on your connection of course. Very affordable home phone alternatives with a real phone number, call forwarding, and voicemail even. I wish I would have had this years ago before wasting so much on, for the most part unused, mobile phone service. I would equate this t...Full ReviewCall quality is good, depending on your connection of course. Very affordable home phone alternatives with a real phone number, call forwarding, and voicemail even. I wish I would have had this years ago before wasting so much on, for the most part unused, mobile phone service. I would equate this to something similar to an old fashioned home phone, except the telephone has been modernized, and comes in the form of any smartphone or computer I chose to use.

MS took a useful tool for business and degraded it to a toy for smartphone addicted teens. let's turn the clock back two years and start again. The app has severe issues connecting to cell customers in N.A. there are delays sometimes so severe that words get out of order and the connection is often ...Full ReviewMS took a useful tool for business and degraded it to a toy for smartphone addicted teens. let's turn the clock back two years and start again. The app has severe issues connecting to cell customers in N.A. there are delays sometimes so severe that words get out of order and the connection is often simplex only - it's like radio, either side talks then says " over". Calling a LL is usually issue free.

Call connection and clarity are fine. BUT the app is often counter-intuitive, difficult to accomplish the simplest things, such as editing a contact or deleting a call from the record. It does not appear to have been designed by someone who actually USES it. Unfortunately, if you use Skype, you're s...Full ReviewCall connection and clarity are fine. BUT the app is often counter-intuitive, difficult to accomplish the simplest things, such as editing a contact or deleting a call from the record. It does not appear to have been designed by someone who actually USES it. Unfortunately, if you use Skype, you're stuck with the app....
Easy to use. Good server to hold good connections. Friendly setup and control
Crashes on startup. Tried restarting my phone, tried reverting to using the default "Quickstep" launcher, still the same.

Skype is just generally the VC my friends and I use to play Minecraft together because it's a good baseline since some of us don't have discord, ts, etc. However it's a tad bit laggy and sometimes even when do not disturb is off I don't get notifs to my phone when someone messages me. This means I m...Full ReviewSkype is just generally the VC my friends and I use to play Minecraft together because it's a good baseline since some of us don't have discord, ts, etc. However it's a tad bit laggy and sometimes even when do not disturb is off I don't get notifs to my phone when someone messages me. This means I might not respond even if I'm online and sometimes it's important. Also, anyone can mute anyone/kick them from a call. I'm sure there's a way to stop this but I wish it was a tad bit more simple.
Sep 2020 review: It either fails to open or it will not display account details such as a complete billing/ payment history as it once would. I'm in agreement with others
column8: MICROSOFT broke this app. Disappointed. 2019 review. Skype is a life saver and a great addition to my apps.

column7: Really nice app. Useful for audio/video and screen sharing call.

Always has connection issues even when my wifi is fine. Rarely get message notifications and the video quality is trash. Always cuts out, disconnects and or doesn't work in total. When I am able to call it disconnects before it can even ring a good 2 times and says "Whoops, something went wrong". Pl...Full ReviewAlways has connection issues even when my wifi is fine. Rarely get message notifications and the video quality is trash. Always cuts out, disconnects and or doesn't work in total. When I am able to call it disconnects before it can even ring a good 2 times and says "Whoops, something went wrong". Plus, it never sends the full message. It always cuts your messages in half. Like what in the hell is wrong with your app? Really thinking of going to a different app. Wouldn't recommend.

I'm reducing my rating from 5 to 3 stars because my default availability status keeps resetting, maybe when the app is updated. I shouldn't have to repeatedly get online and become visible to reset to invisible! Otherwise works very well for me, though I use it only to talk to others who have Skype....Full ReviewI'm reducing my rating from 5 to 3 stars because my default availability status keeps resetting, maybe when the app is updated. I shouldn't have to repeatedly get online and become visible to reset to invisible! Otherwise works very well for me, though I use it only to talk to others who have Skype. very good audio quality. fairly intuitive interface.

Very good video quality and sound quality. I tested this out by muting the skype video call so we could only see each other, and talking on a PS4 party. The audio from the PS4 party synced perfectly with the Skype video. Great app. Highly recommend it. (Also, its incredibly simplistic design, allows...Full ReviewVery good video quality and sound quality. I tested this out by muting the skype video call so we could only see each other, and talking on a PS4 party. The audio from the PS4 party synced perfectly with the Skype video. Great app. Highly recommend it. (Also, its incredibly simplistic design, allows for people, who are not so technologically educated, to make their calls.)

I really liked skype at first, been using it for 2 years. Recent updates have been very frustrating, like the black bars at the top and bottom which blocks the video and there is no option to hide the bars. It keeps getting worst after each update, yes the quality of the call is still amazing but th...Full ReviewI really liked skype at first, been using it for 2 years. Recent updates have been very frustrating, like the black bars at the top and bottom which blocks the video and there is no option to hide the bars. It keeps getting worst after each update, yes the quality of the call is still amazing but the experience have been negatively affected by it.
Very bad, it is no way to hear the calling, there had a long lagging to hear the caller's voice from my OnePlus 6t Android phone.
The app keeps stopping is there a problem with the app or something?i've tried reinstalling but it still dosen't work please fix it
Please fix it it is acting up could nt talk on Skype because it decided to acted up today please fix it camera going in and out keep saying poor connection it also freezes

It works quite well. I just made a call from Tokyo to Bratislava in Slovakia and the connection was really good. It really comes down to the quality of a connection rather than the service provider more often than not. There are so many service options right now for IM and VoIP. It's just that Skype...Full ReviewIt works quite well. I just made a call from Tokyo to Bratislava in Slovakia and the connection was really good. It really comes down to the quality of a connection rather than the service provider more often than not. There are so many service options right now for IM and VoIP. It's just that Skype is one of the older ones. Anyway no complaints. In general the service is working well.

Can't get back to the home screen. No live customer support only a stupid chat that doesn't work because it only gives you options that don't have anything to do with what your problem is. Horrible! 4 months later I can say there is a great improvement. Getting around in Skype is much more intuitive...Full ReviewCan't get back to the home screen. No live customer support only a stupid chat that doesn't work because it only gives you options that don't have anything to do with what your problem is. Horrible! 4 months later I can say there is a great improvement. Getting around in Skype is much more intuitive and the sound quality is better. Still wish we could have synchronous sound so keep trying!

Great for calling from abroad to UK landlines with a small subscription. My Dad in the UK was blocking unknown numbers and I was able to set the caller ID as my UK Mobile number. Works brilliantly with good sound quality. My Dad is hard of hearing but the sound quality through to his home phone is n...Full ReviewGreat for calling from abroad to UK landlines with a small subscription. My Dad in the UK was blocking unknown numbers and I was able to set the caller ID as my UK Mobile number. Works brilliantly with good sound quality. My Dad is hard of hearing but the sound quality through to his home phone is no issue at all.
Skype has secure call, text feature and that's why I love it so much.

It has got some problem with OnePlus 6 model, during calls other parties cannot hear you properly while using speaker mode. You have to use earphones/headphones/speakers. Also there is hassle while you connect wireless earphones. When you pick up call, even though wireless earphones are connected it...Full ReviewIt has got some problem with OnePlus 6 model, during calls other parties cannot hear you properly while using speaker mode. You have to use earphones/headphones/speakers. Also there is hassle while you connect wireless earphones. When you pick up call, even though wireless earphones are connected it will go to speaker and then switching to earphones fails. Sometimes, you have to drop call and then try to reconnect. No doubt about the A/V quality.

Skype has improved a lot in terms of sounds, setups and user friendliness. For instance the line breaks far less often now and you can hear the person on the other side properly. Well done to the team behind these improvements.
It was cool back then! Ut now its getting worse day by day as i received voice note and keeps loading but mot played.

Has become unusable in the last couple months. Doesn't matter how good your WiFi or data is the call quality is terrible, connections dropping and people can't hear me most the time. Other apps are fine, just Skype slowly destroying itself for no good reason.

On my phone it does not show that someone has called or left a message so I sometimes don't return calls for hours. Messenger pops up an image of the caller under the same conditions. I love that you can edit/delete messages. I don't like that you can't select multiple photos to send at once.

Gone down hill of late my device is not pushing message notifications through anymore so I don't know I got messages waiting to be read. Always used to beep and leave the Skype logo in notifications bar at top if I had a new unread message but nothing of late. Only when you open app do you see some ...Full ReviewGone down hill of late my device is not pushing message notifications through anymore so I don't know I got messages waiting to be read. Always used to beep and leave the Skype logo in notifications bar at top if I had a new unread message but nothing of late. Only when you open app do you see some hit and you missed peeps messages and sometimes over hours. Update: It's now some 3 months later and this issue is still present. Just opened app and see someone messaged me several hours ago!

Took me forever to figure out how to use this stupid app, and people I used it with seemed confused about how it works as well. I also just got an email weeks after canceling my free trial telling me that I need to cancel my subscription or I will be charged. Spent 15 minutes trying to figure out ho...Full ReviewTook me forever to figure out how to use this stupid app, and people I used it with seemed confused about how it works as well. I also just got an email weeks after canceling my free trial telling me that I need to cancel my subscription or I will be charged. Spent 15 minutes trying to figure out how to unsubscribe, but as far as I can tell, it's already cancelled. Frustrating. Uninstall.

The best part is that it's free for any number of users and no limit on duration also... And the group is still there after the call unlike other apps... so ppl can go back and read messages and check other content later... and also ppl who have missed the call can check it too

Skype is a great service. It is miles ahead of Zoom both in reliability and ease of use (Zoom is a complete mess). There are things they could improve, like make the calls more stable and use less bandwidth, and allow group admins to delete other people's messages. Overall though I really like this ...Full ReviewSkype is a great service. It is miles ahead of Zoom both in reliability and ease of use (Zoom is a complete mess). There are things they could improve, like make the calls more stable and use less bandwidth, and allow group admins to delete other people's messages. Overall though I really like this program.

column7: Since the latest update, when a call is ended Android still thinks it's on a call so volume settings don't work correctly. Also, why the heck did the answer call button move from the bottom right to top left, and decli...Full ReviewSince the latest update, when a call is ended Android still thinks it's on a call so volume settings don't work correctly. Force closing Skype or restarting the phone resolves this but why is this needed? Also, why the heck did the answer call button move from the bottom right to top left, and decline move from bottom left to top right? At least call major UI changes out in the release notes, or just follow conventions like everything else in the world and put answer on the right.
